title: Non-Profit
description: Ideal for charitable or community-based organizations. Enjoy limited access to events and networking opportunities at discounted rates.

title: Gold
description: Our premium membership level with maximum visibility, promotional support, and VIP access to all events and initiatives.

title: Silver
description: Provides enhanced visibility and participation benefits in chamber activities, including priority event invitations.

title: Bronze
description: Basic membership tier offering standard benefits such as directory listing and entry to general events.
